info.narration: #0 enters $0's containment unit to begin work.
[ {#0 feels a sense of bliss as they enter the containment room.}, {#0 is looking at the child next to $0 with great affection.}, {#0 hardly keeps themselves from walking towards the child.}, ]
[ {The joy and pain of the child will be the bliss and sorrow of #0.}, {Even then #0 can do nothing but watch.}, {The child is merely a lure used by $0 to hunt.}, ]
[ {#0 struggles to contain the longing they feel for the Child.}, {The more the child suffers, the more #0's will weakens.}, {#0 will miss the child after finishing their work.}, ]
[ {Only the hardiest of souls can escape the clutches of $0 after being hunted.}, {#0 has a strong soul, but they would love to stay by this child's side forever.}, ]

collection.name: Missing Child
Missed Reaper
collection.openText: "I’m sorry to ask this but… Can you take me to that room again, please?"

observe.desc:
[ {"I know the child inside that unit is not mine, because they died the day I let go of their hand."
"However, Sir, knowing and accepting are two distinct things, very distinct things."
"A welfare employee informed me that my mental distress was approaching the threshold, so I comprehend your decision. If I were to return there, I would become overwhelmed and susceptible to the same fate as countless employees before me."
"But like I said, knowing is not the same as accepting."
"Ever since that day, I couldn't stop thinking about it, I should’ve said, ‘I’m sorry that I let go of your hand’ and apologized, even if it didn’t mean anything."
"I’m sorry to ask this but… Can you take me to that room again, please?"} ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: If the employee temperance is level 3 or lower, they will rush towards $0 as soon as they enter the room, then $0 will kill them.
If the SP points of the employee are depleted during work, they will rush towards $0 and then $0 will kill them.
$0 only likes repression work. (P. S, don't worry about the child-like figure next to $0 (known as $0-1), they don't affect the PE-BOX output).
During repression work, $0-1 seemed to suffer great pain. This sight brought great sorrow to Gustav, making him receive excesive amounts of white damage on every PE-Box produced.
Every time $0 produced a NE-Box during any work that was not repression, $0-1 seemed happy, and this sight restored Gustav sanity (Once again, $0-1 has nothing to do with the output of PE-Boxes).
